group_1.textCenter: (This is where I'll be living starting today.)
(Papa prepared this place for me@so I could live in Kamihama...)

group_1.textLeft: I've been expecting you, Lady [textRed:Nayuta].

group_1.textRight: You're...

group_1.textLeft: I was asked to serve as your servant, Lady Nayuta.
My name is [textRed:Rabi Himuro].
I look forward to working with you in the future.

group_1.textRight: So Papa sent you...@Could you be a Magical Girl...?

group_1.textLeft: Yes.

group_1.textRight: You've met with Papa in person...?@Where is he now...?

group_1.textLeft: I was only contacted by him,@so I'm afraid I don't know.
I apologize for not measuring@up to your expectations...

group_1.textRight: Oh no, there's no need to apologize.
I don't expect to be able to@trace Papa's footsteps so easily.

group_1.textLeft: Yet you seem certain that he@stopped here in Kamihama.

group_1.textRight: Yes.
Then he prepared a house for me, even though@I hadn't heard from him for six months.
Only to disappear again...
(I don't know what happened...)
(But I'm sure I'll find my Papa...)
(For us...to save the Magical Girls...)

group_1.progressNarration: [textBlack:Flurrying about, making themselves busy,]@[textBlack:they search for signs of its location@with pounding hearts,]@[textBlack:they run about with a gleam in their eyes.]
[textBlack:One was found high in@the mountains of Hokuyo.]@[textBlack:A ][textYellow:Kimochi][textBlack: that was made of immense energy.]
[textBlack:It was Felicia's Hammer that struck and]@[textBlack:smashed it to pieces with a kablam!]@[textBlack:And just as before,@it had turned into a stone,]@[textBlack:it had become a Bracelet.]
[textBlack:To win the race against Promised Blood,]@[textBlack:to protect all the Magical Girls of Kamihama,]@[textBlack:it was one step towards saving@all the Magical Girls in the world.]
[textBlack:So, for the people of Kamihama@and the Tokime Clan,]@[textBlack:even if there were a few mixed feelings,]@[textBlack:for now a smile blossomed on their faces.]
[textBlack:However,]@[textBlack:that smile quickly faded@away into the background...]
[textBlack:Iroha's little sister, Ui...]@[textBlack:She was kidnapped by Promised Blood...]

[textBlack:What I'm going to put together is a summary]@[textBlack:of the days before Ui was abducted.]@[textBlack:Days when I was still relieved@that they got the stone,]@[textBlack:days when a chain of misfortunes befell@the girl that came to Kamihama.]

[textBlack:I think it must have been hard for her.]@[textBlack:But for me, meeting a girl with the same goal]@[textBlack:was an encouraging experience.]@[textBlack:I think I'll retell it all again...]
[textBlack:Magical Girls,]@[textBlack:and those who are trying@to spread the word,]@[textBlack:meet.]

group_1.textRight: This is the investigation report@from the detective agency.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you.
...@[wait:1.0][chara:103701:lipSynch_1][chara:103701:eyeClose_1][chara:103701:voiceFull_fullvoice/section_102304/vo_full_102304-1-37]*Sigh*...

group_1.textRight: In regards to your father's whereabouts...@Are they still unknown?

group_1.textLeft: Yes. It's regrettable,@but that does seem to be the case...

group_1.textRight: It's been almost a month since you moved in.

group_1.textLeft: Even though I don't have to pay the success fee,@making no progress, I feel like I'm being bled dry.

group_1.textRight: I'm sure your father is still alive. Surely you don't@need to push yourself so hard looking for him?
After all, I don't think you're suffering@from any financial difficulties, Lady Nayuta.

group_1.textLeft: That's not what this is about.
My Papa promised that we@would save Magical Girls together.

group_1.narration: "I need your help Nayuta, I can't do this on my own.@Help me free you all from the yoke of being a Magical Girl."
"The outside world has rarely spoken of them,@but I will bring to light the truth of Magical Girls."
"That being said, the only thing a scholar like myself@can do is research away and compile@my findings into a book of my own."
"Still, we need that book to serve as an entrypoint@for the world's discussion of the subject,@and to ensure more children don't fall prey@to becoming Magical Girls..."
Ever since that day,@Papa and I have been working together@to find out more about Magical Girls.

I would get to know other Magical Girls, and try@to learn more about how they went about making@a contract and the circumstances surrounding them.@Meanwhile, Papa traveled around the world,@seeking events in various cultures that could@be tied to Magical Girls.
Then, we compiled our findings into a book titled@"Magical Girls: Their Hope and Despair"@and began work on the final volume.

group_1.textRight: And it's been some time since I last heard from him,@when he arranged for the house and myself.

group_1.textLeft: That's right...because it's safe here in Kamihama...

group_1.textRight: Is he really still here?

group_1.textLeft: Even if he's not here, I'd like to find a trace of him.

group_1.textRight: The detective agency is no help, either.
So you can't just stay home,@you'll have to use your own two feet to find him.

group_1.textLeft: Aren't you being a little cold in your tone?

group_1.textRight: Well, he's not MY father.

group_1.textLeft: *Chuckle*
It's easier to do when you're that dry about it.

group_1.textRight: Are you expecting a visitor?

group_1.textLeft: It's that girl...

group_1.textRight: [surround:3025A02][chara:6109:effect_7000_attack01]How's this?!

group_1.textLeft: [surround:3025A02][chara:6109:effect_7002_damage01][bgEffect:shakeSmall]倥Бф繧後!?!?
Are these wounds not fatal?

group_1.textRight: No, you can't be too careful...@What you see might not be what you get...

group_1.textLeft: ｧ螳ｴб壹!

group_1.textRight: I knew it...

group_1.textCenter: Hey hey! Are you Magical Girls from out of town?@Let Mii lend you a hand!
